ygData.subject: Re: Forage and Sense heading (was Re: Sonorous Clouding message)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Food is consumed in the order it s found in your inventory. If you don t want something to be eaten make sure it s at the bottom of your backpack with some
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Aug 31/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
>
> p.s. I been lugging around a spit and making some wolf and bear sammichs.
> Gotta try some beer braised things next. For some odd reason, loaf of bread
> is consumed faster than muffins. Sometimes by the time I get some wolf or
> bear meat my bread is gone.

Food is consumed in the order it's found in your inventory. If you don't
want something to be eaten make sure it's at the bottom of your backpack
with some muffins above it. The search order for food in backpacks seems
to run from top left to bottom left then top right to bottom right.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
